title: Griddled pak choi with soya beans and toasted sesame butter

ingredients.item: 1 tbsp rice wine vinegar or lemon juice
200g frozen soya beans, defrosted and patted dry
2 x 235g packs large pak choi, trimmed

instructions.step: Crush 2 tbsp toasted sesame seeds in a pestle and mortar, then tip into a small saucepan. Add the butter, soy and vinegar or lemon juice. Warm through gently to melt the butter. Add the soya beans, stir and keep warm.

Put a griddle pan over a very high heat until smoking hot. Slice each pak choi in half from top to bottom. Toss with the oil. Place on the griddle in a single layer, in 2 batches if needed, and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side. Divide between plates and spoon the buttery beans over. Scatter with the reserved sesame seeds to serve.
